LanguageData.Bullet_Ballistaz.label: ballista bolt
LanguageData.FrontierBarbedWire.label: frontier barbed wire
LanguageData.FrontierBarbedWire.description: A basic defensive structure that slows down the enemy, and injure them in the process, perfect to prevent any hostiles from crossing your territory.
LanguageData.FrontierWall.label: frontier wall
LanguageData.FrontierWall.description: An impassable, defensive wall that was used to keep the horrors of the rim at bay. Highly resistant in most forms of damage and capable of holding a roof.
LanguageData.FrontierWallEmbrasure.label: frontier embrasure wall
LanguageData.FrontierWallEmbrasure.description: A frontier wall with elongated holes to shoot at. Capable of holding a roof
LanguageData.Gun_BallistaTurretz.label: manned ballista turret
LanguageData.Gun_BallistaTurretz.description: A mannable ballista made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_Cannonz.label: manned cannon turret
LanguageData.Gun_Cannonz.description: A mannable cannon made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Gun_Cannonz.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: manned cannon turret
LanguageData.Gun_GatlingTurretz.label: manned gatling turret
LanguageData.Gun_GatlingTurretz.description: A mannable gatling gun made to be mounted on a turret.
LanguageData.Trap_ExplosiveMine.label: frontier mine
LanguageData.Trap_ExplosiveMine.description: An explosive proximity mine which triggers a frag explosion when stepped by an enemy.
LanguageData.Turret_Mannable_Ballista.label: ballista turret "mannable"
LanguageData.Turret_Mannable_Ballista.description: A stationary ballista bolt launcher mounted in a quad-pod, capable of firing ten bolts at high speeds that penetrates armor.
LanguageData.Turret_Mannable_Cannon.label: cannon turret "mannable"
LanguageData.Turret_Mannable_Cannon.description: A stationary cannon mounted in a mechanical cannon emplacement. Built specifically for long-ranged bombardment, this cannon can unleash hell through groups of enemies through using some of the deadliest cannon shells ever produced from the hunters workshop.
LanguageData.Turret_Mannable_Gatling.label: gatling turret "mannable"
LanguageData.Turret_Mannable_Gatling.description: A stationary gatling gun mounted in a quad-pod. It can fire deadly rounds of bullets at great distance.
